commit message:
Add log output when we abandon an item.

To give us more clues to investigate this bug:
https://github.com/murraycu/android-galaxyzoo/issues/12
which might be caused by (Picasso) loading of images failing for every
image in the database, for some reason.

ClassifyActivity: Set a global Picasso onImageLoadFailed().

So we can log some clues.

ClassifyActivity: Actually use the built Picasso instance.

So it is used elsewhere, to log failures.
